I think the creation of this is complex enough that it should be a model. Returning a dict just makes callers do something like [Signature(**sig_data) for sig_data in autographer.sign_data()], which doesn't seem better to me.
The key part for me is that I don't see Autographer being used for anything except generating Signature instances. Maybe it should be a part of the Signature model?
